metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24599 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: In autofile Audio File Library 0.3.6, there exists one memory leak vulnerability in printfileinfo, in printinfo.c, which allows an attacker to leak sensitive information via a crafted file. The printfileinfo function calls the copyrightstring function to get data, however, it dosn't use zero bytes to truncate the data.

criterions.comment: audiofile: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
